text:
Hello everyone
So I have some emails included on my plan
However, I cannot generate an SMTP API because I don't really have the Transactional Email service (because of the additional cost)
So how can I send my emails programatically without having the TE service?
They should, can you share an example of your code?
How is the email built - is it using the drag and drop builder, or something else?
Do you have the Marketing > Email option in the top navigation?
